titles.title: Supporting the goals and ideals of a National Miner's Day to celebrate and honor the contributions of miners and encouraging the people of the United States to participate in local and National activities celebrating and honoring the contributions of miners.

Supporting the goals and ideals of a National Miner's Day to celebrate and honor the contributions of miners and encouraging the people of the United States to participate in local and National activities celebrating and honoring the contributions of miners.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Education and Labor.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Workforce Protections.

bill.summary: Supports the goals and ideals of a National Miner's Day.
